verses.verse: Behold <S%H2005><s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> is not <S%H7114>shortened<s%>, that it cannot <S%H3467>save<s%>; neither his <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%>, that it cannot <S%H8085>hear<s%>:

but your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H914>separated<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and your <S%H430>God<s%>, and your <S%H2403>sins<s%> have <S%H5641>hid<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H8085>you<s%>, so that he will not hear.

For your <S%H3709>hands<s%> are <S%H1351>defiled<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and your <S%H676>fingers<s%> with <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; your <S%H8193>lips<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%>, your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1897>muttereth<s%> <S%H5766>wickedness<s%>.

None <S%H7121>sueth<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and none <S%H8199>pleadeth<s%> in <S%H530>truth<s%>: they <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H8414>vanity<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>lies<s%>; they <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H5999>mischief<s%>, and bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.

They <S%H1234>hatch<s%> <S%H6848>adders<s%>' <S%H1000>eggs<s%>, and <S%H707>weave<s%> the <S%H5908>spider<s%>'s <S%H6980>web<s%>: he that <S%H398>eateth<s%> of their <S%H1000>eggs<s%> <S%H4191>dieth<s%>; and that which is <S%H2116>crushed<s%> breaketh <S%H1234>out<s%> into a <S%H660>viper<s%>.

Their <S%H6980>webs<s%> shall not become <S%H899>garments<s%>, neither shall they <S%H3680>cover<s%> themselves with their <S%H4639>works<s%>: their <S%H4639>works<s%> are <S%H4639>works<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, and the <S%H6467>act<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> is in their <S%H3709>hands<s%>.

Their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and they make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>: their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>; <S%H7701>desolation<s%> and <S%H7667>destruction<s%> are in their <S%H4546>paths<s%>.

The <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> they <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4941>not<s%>; and there is no justice in their <S%H4570>goings<s%>: they have made them <S%H6140>crooked<s%> <S%H5410>paths<s%>; whosoever <S%H1869>goeth<s%> therein doth not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

Therefore is <S%H4941>justice<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H6666>us<s%>, neither doth righteousness <S%H5381>overtake<s%> <S%H6960>us<s%>: we look for <S%H216>light<s%>, <S%H2822>but<s%>, behold, darkness; for <S%H5054>brightness<s%>, but we <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H653>obscurity<s%>.

We <S%H1659>grope<s%> for the <S%H7023>wall<s%> like the <S%H5787>blind<s%>; <S%H1659>yea<s%>, we grope as they that have no <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: we <S%H3782>stumble<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday<s%> as in the <S%H5399>twilight<s%>; among them that are <S%H820>lusty<s%> we are as dead <S%H4191>men<s%>.

We <S%H1993>roar<s%> all like <S%H1677>bears<s%>, and <S%H1897>moan<s%> <S%H1897>sore<s%> like <S%H3123>doves<s%>: we <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H4941>justice<s%>, but there is <S%H3444>none<s%>; for salvation, but it is far off from <S%H7368>us<s%>.

For our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>multiplied<s%> before <S%H2403>thee<s%>, and our sins <S%H6030>testify<s%> against <S%H6588>us<s%>; for our transgressions are with <S%H5771>us<s%>, and as for our iniquities, we know <S%H3045>them<s%>:

transgressing <S%H6586><s%> and <S%H3584>denying<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and turning <S%H5253>away<s%> <S%H310>from<s%> following our <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H6233>oppression<s%> and <S%H5627>revolt<s%>, <S%H2029>conceiving<s%> and <S%H1897>uttering<s%> from the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>.

And <S%H4941>justice<s%> is turned <S%H5253>away<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%>, and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>standeth<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>; for <S%H571>truth<s%> is <S%H3782>fallen<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%>, and <S%H5229>uprightness<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%>.

Yea <S%H571><s%>, truth is <S%H5737>lacking<s%>; and he that <S%H5493>departeth<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%> maketh himself a <S%H7997>prey<s%>. And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3415>it<s%>, and it displeased him that there was no <S%H4941>justice<s%>.

And he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was no <S%H376>man<s%>, and <S%H8074>wondered<s%> that there was no <S%H6293>intercessor<s%>: therefore his own <S%H2220>arm<s%> brought <S%H3467>salvation<s%> unto <S%H6666>him<s%>; and his righteousness, it upheld <S%H5564>him<s%>.

And he put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> as a <S%H8302>breastplate<s%>, and a <S%H3553>helmet<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>; and he put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> for <S%H8516>clothing<s%>, and was <S%H5844>clad<s%> with <S%H7068>zeal<s%> as a <S%H4598>mantle<s%>.

According <S%H5921>to<s%> their <S%H1578>deeds<s%>, accordingly he will <S%H7999>repay<s%>, <S%H2534>wrath<s%> to his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, <S%H1576>recompense<s%> to his <S%H341>enemies<s%>; to the <S%H339>islands<s%> he will <S%H7999>repay<s%> <S%H1576>recompense<s%>.

So shall they <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> from the <S%H4628>west<s%>, and his <S%H3519>glory<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>; for <S%H6862>he<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> as a rushing <S%H5104>stream<s%>, which the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5127>driveth<s%>.

And a <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and unto them that <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H6588>transgression<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And as for <S%H1285>me<s%>, this is my covenant with <S%H559>them<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> that is upon <S%H1697>thee<s%>, and my words which I have <S%H7760>put<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> out of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, nor out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, nor out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>'s <S%H2233>seed<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, from henceforth and <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
